heading: About the Club
paragraphs: Founded in 2025, the Data Science Club at ELTE brings together students, researchers, and practitioners to explore, apply, and advance data-driven methods across diverse domains.

We organize talks, workshops, hackathons, and collaborative projects with a focus on hands-on learning, practical applications, and mentorship. Our community supports curious minds with resources, guidance, and opportunities to experiment, build, and grow.
focus: Data science and machine learning foundations
Real-world applications of AI and analytics
Generative AI and modern LLM tools
